markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Campaign Stable](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1569)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Used to facilitate the care of mounts during long campaigns or when it's necessary to move camp frequently, this object appears to be a simple, worn wooden horseshoe.

<document level="2" id="action-1183" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
